sentences.english: They're more likely to have children of low birth rate and more birth complications.
sentences.chinese: 高齡人羣可能會導致低出生率和更多的出生併發症。

sentences.english: They were both almost eighty-seven years old.
So does Mugabe, even at 85, have the capacity to change?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，已經85歲高齡的穆加貝還有能力改變嗎？

sentences.english: Is 102-year-old rose claimed that she is the girl.
sentences.chinese: 已經是102歲高齡的羅絲聲稱她就是畫中的少女。
科索夫大師即將邁入84歲高齡。

sentences.english: She lives with her mother who is a very agile and alert eight two year old.
sentences.chinese: 張女士和她八十二歲高齡卻思維敏捷的母親住在一起。

sentences.english: Objective To study the method of the artificial thigh bone permutation perioperatively for advanced age.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討高齡人工股骨頭置換術圍手術期的治療方法。

sentences.english: And this, at the grand old age of 37.
sentences.chinese: 這些，都是37歲“高齡”的我的想法。

sentences.english: The low fertility rate and advanced age-rization make the burden heavier for middle class.
sentences.chinese: 而生育率降低加上高齡化讓中產階級的負擔隨之增加。

sentences.english: Wherefore by departing manfully out of this life, I shall shew myself worthy of my old age.
sentences.chinese: 所以現在，我若是勇敢捨生，我不愧有此高齡。

sentences.english: Mr Mikesell's old age brought with it a noteworthy achievement.
sentences.chinese: 邁克塞爾的高齡同時帶來了顯著的成績。

sentences.english: Some of us make it to the ripe old age of 80, 90 a 100 or more.
sentences.chinese: 有些人活到八九十歲高齡甚至更老。

sentences.english: Thus, the perfect the design of for intercourse space of the elderly house is the top priority for architectures.
sentences.chinese: 所以高齡者居住建築的發展在我國具有的重要意義。

sentences.english: Law and Justice packed the senior reaches of officialdom with party placemen;
sentences.chinese: “法律與公正”黨召集了有政黨席位的高齡政客。

sentences.english: Objective:To probe into the nursing care of senile patients with carotid artery stenosis underwent stent plasty.
sentences.chinese: 探討高齡頸動脈狹窄支架成形術病人的護理。

sentences.english: Male and old age were the risk factors to higher aerobic conjunctival flora.
sentences.chinese: 高齡和男性是結膜囊帶菌量較高的危險因素。

definition: classifier for years (of age)/year/year (of crop harvests)
unable to move freely/difficult to get about
to sponsor/to adopt (pledge to give sb or sth one's special attention or support)/to adopt (choose to raise a child or animal as one's own)
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
